content: कृश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृश् --क्त नि°] (<ab>Compar.</ab> क्रशीयस्; <ab>superl.</ab> क्रशिष्ठ) {@--1@} Lean, weak, feeble, emaciated; कृशतनुः, कृशोदरि &c. {@--2@} Small, little, minute (in size or quantity); सुहृदपि न याच्यः कृशधनः <ls>Bh. 2. 28.</ls> {@--3@} Poor, insignificant; <ls>Ms. 7. 208.</ls>
